TopicTitle: Reverting Flight to SPH with tourist Crash

Articles.Content:
Version: 1.0.0.830

Windows 7

Description: I reverted a flight after landing a plane with a tourist kerbal in it. The game crashed upon reaching the SPH. I will attempt to reproduce and add additional info.

EDIT: Attempted to reproduce twice by flying the plane with the same crew, landing and reverting as I did previously. The crash did not come back.

[Screenshot of craft](http://i.imgur.com/uwZ8zly.jpg)

[Link to craft file.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3ttczPyBDOnRkhJTDJGTW9lMzA/view?usp=sharing)

[Link to crash log download.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3ttczPyBDOnY2hEcHZUOU11OUU/view?usp=sharing)
